title: Human
entryLore: Humans are the most ambitious and adaptable of the common races. They have a remarkable capacity for learning and a drive to leave a lasting mark on the world, whether through conquest, art, or discovery.

traits.name: Resourceful
traits.description: You gain [[heroic_inspiration]] whenever you finish a [[long_rest]].

traits.name: Skillful
traits.description: You gain proficiency in one skill of your choice.

traits.name: Versatile
traits.description: You gain an [[feats|Origin feat]] of your choice.
